title: Find $$r$$
text: The ratio between the $$a_2$$ and $$a_1$$ is $$\frac{9}{10}$$. The ratio between $$a_3$$ and $$a_2$$ is $$\frac{8}{9}$$. Therefore there is no constant ratio.

title: Is series geometric?
text: Since there is no common ratio, the series is not geometric.
speech: Since there is no common ratio, the series is not geometric.

title: Sum of Infinite Geometric Series
text: Since the series is not geometric, the sum does not exist.
